title: Movement between classifications
custom_preconds:
The section contains a table with the following columns:

Date

Description

From 

To
custom_steps:
Select umpire_id
From umpire_history

Note: Currently there's no way to create an inactive history record in BLUE besides inserting it through the db.
custom_expected:
The table is populated with the umpire’s movement between classifications:

Promotions/Demotions from classifications, ex. moved from Low-A to AA

Descriptions are noted as “Classification Change” 

From and To columns denote [Classification] - [League], if to Majors, then just [Classification]

Crew Chief Assignments

Descriptions are “Appointment as Crew Chief” or “Removed as Crew Chief”

Transaction comes from changes to the Crew Chief checkbox on the umpire’s profile

Inactive Date

Description is “Inactive”

From and To are blank
